name: Shattered (itch) (maitake)
description:
Ellie's memmories have shattered after an accident!

Collect fragments of his memories  while avoiding or killing the enemies by jumbing on top of them.

Later you can help him guide his spaceship back to his planet!

The game starts as a classic platformer and ends with guiding a spaceship through a galaxy! 

Avoid the meteorites and find a blue planet to land!

Controls:

Arrow keys and wasd for platformer

Mouse for spaceship navigation
